document_data.name: ''Dale's Protector''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dale's Protector''''' was the name given to a set of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] bracers that were given to the archers of the [[Great Dale]] under direction of the realm's king.
document_data.Powers: These bracers greatly increased the accuracy of the wearer with ranged [[weapon]]s.
document_data.History: When the King of the Great Dale arranged a meeting with one of his more dangerous political rivals, he requested the aid of his nation's most skilled archers in addition to his usual guard. As they expected, opposing soldiers ambushed the king and his retinue, but were shot down in a hail of arrows before they could reach the monarch.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Elan Garaq]], a [[rakshasa]] trader in the [[Black Pits]].
*[[Zal]], a [[dart]]-slinging bandit and the partner of [[Vax]] from the area to the south from [[Nashkel]] ''circa'' [[1368 DR]].
